name: Test Project - Greg the Cube
description:
Hello there! This is a game where you click a button to change the cube's color,

There is more information inside of the README file.

the cube's name is greg.

This is my first upload, and my first project aswell. Learning to code and i'm hoping to join a gamejam sometime later. of course when i get better...

feel free to give me any game idea's, since this is the only thing that came out of my head... and do feel free to aswell give me recommendations on what i could improve, it's what i need.
